Question: In 2001, this person provided the voice of Sharon Spitz, the lead character in the Canadian animated television Braceface.
Hints: Also released in 1997 was Excess Baggage, the first movie by this person's production company, First Kiss Production.
This person continued her theatre work, next appearing in David Mamet's Boston Marriage and Speed-the-Plow.
Federal campaign contribution records list this person contributing $500 USD to Dennis Kucinich's 2004 presidential campaign.
